data.expected_result: The image doesn't get cut off.
data.short_description: The image in the "Verify by email" page gets cut off when you click on the text field. [Low/Mid dpi specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new account. - Go to any server with at least the second level of verification. - Click on verify account. - Click on the email field. - Scroll up.
